message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price of $1400000. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll love it.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $1200000, which is the minimum I'm willing to go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1150000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1150000, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $1180000. This is the closest I can get to your price without going below my minimum value for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1150000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet at this price. Can you consider it?
